# Hi there!

Welcome to my website! My name is Alyssa Counsell and I am faculty member in the [Department of Psychology](https://www.torontomu.ca/psychology/) at Toronto Metropolitan University (formerly Ryerson University).

I lead the Psychology and Statistics Education Research [(PASER) Lab](https://www.psystat.org).

My program of research focuses on statistics education, statistics anxiety, statistics attitudes, and statistical software.
